title: ReserveNow - Online Booking & Reservation System
description: A Laravel-based booking and reservation system with Docker containerization, featuring MySQL and MongoDB databases, event-driven notifications, and queue-based background processing. Includes role-based access control, payment processing integration, and API authentication with Laravel Sanctum.

title: DonateCA - Charity Donation Platform
description: A comprehensive full-stack web platform built with Laravel that connects donors with charities, enabling transparent donation management and facilitating charitable giving. Features role-based access control, image uploads, donation tracking, and offer management.

title: Ohme Energy Tracking App
description: A comprehensive energy management application featuring energy calendar tracking, goal progression monitoring, remote appliance control, and personalized energy-saving tips. Built to help users monitor usage, save money, and adopt greener living practices.

title: Medical Clinic Management System
description: A full-featured healthcare management dashboard for managing doctors, patients, appointments, diagnoses, and prescriptions. Includes authentication, form validation, and comprehensive CRUD operations for medical data management.

title: Global Countries & Celebrities Portal
description: An interactive web portal showcasing featured countries with flags and capitals, alongside trending celebrities from around the world. Features carousel navigation, detailed information pages, and a responsive design for exploring global data.
